Helper function to connect to Snowflake

snowflake_connection_function.Rd

This is used by snowflake_connection and does not need to be called directly

snowflake_connection_function(
  username = askpass::askpass("Please enter your username"),
  password = askpass::askpass("Please enter your password"),
  role,
  database,
  schema,
  warehouse,
  server,
  port = 443,
  driver = "SnowflakeDSIIDriver",
  token_provider
)

Arguments

username

the username used to collect the auth token to connect to snowflake.
password

the password used to collect the auth token to connect to snowflake
role

the user role used to connect to Snowflake.
database

the Snowflake database to connect to.
schema

the Snowflake schema to connect to.
warehouse

the Snowflake warehouse to connect to.
server

the Snowflakeserver to connect to.
port

the port to connect to the Snowflake instance.
driver

the driver to use to connect to the Snowflake instance.
token_provider

location of the auth token provider needed to access Snowflake.

Contents
